vulnerabilities.title: Out-of-bounds Write
vulnerabilities.description: A vulnerability in zlib could allow an attacker to cause a buffer overflow by providing specially crafted input.

vulnerabilities.title: OS Command Injection
vulnerabilities.description: A vulnerability in OpenSSL could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system.

vulnerabilities.title: Out-of-bounds Read
vulnerabilities.description: A vulnerability in libwebp could allow an attacker to read memory outside of allocated buffers.

vulnerabilities.title: Out-of-bounds Read
vulnerabilities.description: A vulnerability in libxml2 could allow an attacker to read memory outside of allocated buffers.
